content:
The 2021 CMS HL7® FHIR® Connectathon Bulk Data API Track Kick Off call is tomorrow, July 15 at 11am CT. The Zoom link to Thursday’s meeting is below. This meeting will be recorded and posted to Whova.

To join Zoom Kick Off Meeting https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/99319136971?pwd=ZUVZVk1qN2U0ZnhHZnRvbFM0a3ZoUT09
This is our Whova page https://whova.com/portal/webapp/cmsco_202107/sign_in/
This is our Confluence page for the Bulk Data track https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/CMS2021-07+Bulk+Data

Bulk Data Track Kick Off Call Agenda

  1. Introduction
  2. Bulk Data Track Overview
  3. Track Schedule
  4. Track Resources
  5. Resources for FHIR newbies and first time Connect-a-thoners
  6. Questions

Time: Thursday, July 15 at 11am CT

Meeting ID: 993 1913 6971
Passcode: 069480
One tap mobile
+13126266799,,99319136971# US (Chicago)
+16465588656,,99319136971# US (New York)

Dial by your location
+1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago)
+1 646 558 8656 US (New York)
+1 301 715 8592 US (Washington DC)
+1 669 900 9128 US (San Jose)
+1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma)
+1 346 248 7799 US (Houston)
Meeting ID: 993 1913 6971
Find your local number: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/u/aeg4blQU1i

Join by Skype for Business
https://hl7-org.zoom.us/skype/99319136971

This is our Whova page https://whova.com/portal/webapp/cmsco_202107/sign_in/
This is our Confluence page for the Bulk Data track https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/CMS2021-07+Bulk+Data

Hi everyone! I'm the CMS product manager for BCDA (Beneficiary Claims Data API). Anna Routh is the CMS product manager for AB2D (Claims Data to Part D Sponsors API).

We just heard from Jimmy McConnell and Katie Campbell Downie on BCDA today, and from Will Nyffenegger on AB2D. Please let us know if you have any questions regarding these services and accessing the respective sandboxes.

BCDA: https://bcda.cms.gov/guide.html#try-the-api
AB2D: https://ab2d.cms.gov/tutorial-postman-swagger.html
